name: Hooded Hero
description:
If it fails to load on the web, download the zipfile with the appropriate computer type displayed next to file/in Title. 
Game controls are (WASD) or arrows(up, down, left, right) on the keyboard to move the main character. Hit the Space bar to jump, 'E' or Enter/Return button to interact, click on the Left button on mouse/keypad to punch, click ESC button to quit, restart, or pause.
